programme.title: Wild Kratts
programme.desc: Martin and Chris explore why some animals mimic the looks of other animals. They encounter a cheetah cub and its mother, but the evil fashion designer already cat-naps the startled cheetah mom right in front of their eyes.

programme.desc: When a little dog gets lost in the fog, it's Sparks' Crew to the rescue! But, this mission isn't so easy in the thick fog. How can they find the dog when they can't even find each other in the fog?

programme.desc: George loses a batch of Chef Pisghetti's newest creation, Giardino burgers. And they need to be delivered to the Fireman's Picnic right away. Can George save the day by re-creating the chef's recipe? Also, George decides to conquer his fear of the dark.
